name: [Sword Equipped!]
description:
Sword Equipped is  a wonderful game designed and created by Arpith and Ankith Dev!

This Game Was Made for the ScoreSpace Game Jam #16

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Attack

If bullet touches sword the enemies bullet will destroy

ScoreSpaces'

Website: https://www.scorespace.net/

Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/scorespace/?hl=en

Twitter:https://twitter.com/scrspc

Thank you very much ScoreSpace for making this happen!

Enjoy Playing this Game and I hope it Satisfies you!
